name: CAS
description:
CAS :: Customizable Attachment System

Attach a variety of decorative items to your characters and thralls!
This includes: belts, pouches, backpacks, sheathed weapons, layered armor, cloaks, glasses, smoking pipes, etc.
Check the documentation link below for an overview of all features!

|| Documentation || --> https://thraxerrrr.github.io/CAS/
|| Discord || --> https://discord.gg/FtWrKAZ
changeNote:
v0.12.1

* Updated for compatibility with Age of War Chapter 1
* More mask variations! Contributed by Melonpan
author: Thraxerrrr
